case_title: ATTA MUHAMMAD and others vs Mst. AZIZ and others
legal_basis: Section 13 of the Consolidation of Holdings Ordinance, 1960
order_summary: Revision petition dismissed in limine as the impugned order was in conformity with the provisions of law. The Additional Commissioner (Cons.) rightly ordered for rejoining the Khata of the parties, which was partitioned without justification.

key_points.joint_khata_partition: Requires consent in writing of all shareholders.
